How to Install (Easy!)
  1. Open the ADK Training Hub in your browser
  2. Look for the "Install" button in your browser's address bar or menu
  3. Click "Install" and follow the prompts
  4. Launch the app from your home screen or app launcher
  5. Enjoy offline access to all tutorials!
